title: I haven't done anything wrong but cutting my kitten's claws makes me feel like an awful person.
body:
Especially when I'm _not even anywhere close to the quick_ but he cries out like he's IN PAIN OVER GETTING HIS NAILS TRIMMED AND MAKES ME PULL AWAY SO I DON'T HURT HIM EVEN THOUGH I K N O W THAT WON'T HAPPEN IN THE FIRST PLACE.

It took me all day to get these nails done and I gave up and just held him in place between my legs and he gave up trying to get away and just let me do it as he _buried his head into my stomach like I was about to kill him or some shit._

At least he liked the treats he got for it afterward.
